snippet.title: Dying for Daylight Trailer
snippet.description:
Download Free: http://www.gamefools.com/pc-games/dying-for-daylight.html

Take on the role of Dahlia, a vampire with a devastating sense of fashion and a razor-sharp wit, as you are led into a dark world of an avant-garde circus troupe where you must track down its scattered vampire members.  With each member holding a piece of a legendary potion, it's up to you to discover their devious secrets and procure the potion before it fall into the wrong hands.  Interact with eccentric characters that go bump in the night, at least for now.
